headline: Union Pacific CEO tells customers they will benefit from merger
summary: Union Pacific's chief executive fired back at rivals who oppose the merger to create the first transcontinental railroad. The post Union Pacific CEO tells customers they will benefit from merger appeared first on FreightWaves.
